snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq composite index both closed slightly lower.
abstract: Stock market ends with little change, although Dow Jones industrial average creeps up to another nominal high; Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and Nasdaq composite index both close slightly lower.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and the Nasdaq composite index both closed slightly lower.

headline.main: Dow Ekes Out 8th Consecutive Gain in Otherwise Flat Trading
headline.print_headline: Dow Ekes Out 8th Consecutive Gain in Otherwise Flat Trading
